subject: p10715477
Findings: Cardiomegaly is stable. Vascular congestion has improved, now is mild. Right lower lobe atelectasis has increased. Aeration of the left hemidiaphragm has minimally improved. Left IJ catheter tip is in the mid SVC. There is no evidence of pneumothorax. Small bilateral pleural effusions are unchanged.
